scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && npm run build:types
scripts.local:test: npm run db:up && npm run test:postgres11 && npm run test:postgres12 && npm run test:postgres13 && npm run test:postgres14 && npm run test:postgres15 && npm run db:down
scripts.local:coverage: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml up --build -d postgres15 && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up waitpostgres15 && npm run test:postgres15:coverage && npm run db:down
scripts.test:postgres11: npm run lint && cross-env DB=postgres11 jest --config test/jest.config.js
scripts.test:postgres12: npm run lint && cross-env DB=postgres12 jest --config test/jest.config.js
scripts.test:postgres13: npm run lint && cross-env DB=postgres13 jest --config test/jest.config.js
scripts.test:postgres14: npm run lint && cross-env DB=postgres14 jest --config test/jest.config.js
scripts.test:postgres15: npm run lint && cross-env DB=postgres15 jest --config test/jest.config.js
scripts.test:postgres15:coverage: npm run lint && cross-env DB=postgres15 jest --config test/jest.config.js --coverage
scripts.db:up: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml up --build -d postgres11 postgres12 postgres13 postgres14 postgres15 && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up waitpostgres11 waitpostgres12 waitpostgres13 waitpostgres14 waitpostgres15
